  2. Danish researchers use machine learning to predict aspects of individual lives, including when someone might die  CNN
  3. Using sequences of life-events to predict human lives  Nature.com
  4. New AI Model Can Predict Human Lives, Raising Ethical Questions  Northeastern University
  5. This AI Trained on the Life Events of Every Person in Denmark. It Can Now Predict Their Future.  Singularity Hub
